titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the Gibson Dam.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

bill.summary:
4/27/2015--Introduced. This bill authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC), upon the request of the licensee for the project numbered 12478-003 (Gibson Dam, Montana), to extend for six years the time period during which the licensee is required to commence construction.
Commences such time period upon expiration of the previous extension issued by FERC before enactment of this Act.
